layman_description: Equipment that prevents you from being displaced or knocked back.
technical_description: Equipment with knockback immunity and position lock.
player_impact: Cannot be pushed or knocked down by any attack.

layman_description: Magical container that generates unlimited amounts of stored items.
technical_description: Equipment with infinite resource generation and duplication effect.
player_impact: Draw unlimited supplies from this container forever.

layman_description: Tech device that allows impossible crafting combinations normally prohibited.
technical_description: Equipment with crafting restriction bypass and paradox handling.
player_impact: Craft items with incompatible ingredient combinations.

layman_description: High-tech storage that compresses infinite mass into tiny space.
technical_description: Equipment with mass compression and density multiplication.
player_impact: Store unlimited weight and items in single inventory slot.

layman_description: Device that shows you everything happening in entire game world.
technical_description: Equipment with world awareness and global status display.
player_impact: See all players and enemies on worldwide map constantly.

layman_description: Magical book that rewrites past actions changing outcomes.
technical_description: Equipment with action rewind and outcome manipulation.
player_impact: Undo your last action completely as if it never happened.

layman_description: Oracle artifact that shows you the near future for preparation.
technical_description: Equipment with future event preview and threat prediction.
player_impact: Know what happens next and prepare accordingly.

layman_description: Mystical rope that prevents reality from changing around you.
technical_description: Equipment with event prevention and change immunity.
player_impact: Random events cannot affect you anymore.

layman_description: Tech that synchronizes you with alternate universe versions.
technical_description: Equipment with parallel self summoning and duplicate creation.
player_impact: Summon alternate versions of yourself to help fight.

layman_description: Piece of absolute power that grants one reality-altering wish.
technical_description: Equipment with single use wish system and powerful effect.
player_impact: Use one reality-breaking ability of your choice.

layman_description: Device that creates unpredictable but beneficial random effects.
technical_description: Equipment with chaos effect generation and random benefit.
player_impact: Random powerful effects occur constantly benefiting you.

layman_description: Technology that lets you communicate with any creature or object.
technical_description: Equipment with communication unlock and understanding bonus.
player_impact: Understand and talk to any NPC or creature types.

layman_description: Equipment that backs up your consciousness preventing permanent death.
technical_description: Equipment with consciousness backup and resurrection safety.
player_impact: Can resurrect yourself if killed instead of losing progress.

layman_description: Chemical that rapidly advances biological evolution and mutation.
technical_description: Consumable with mutation speed increase and evolution boost.
player_impact: Gain powerful mutations and evolve rapidly.

layman_description: Serum that makes your body adjust to any environmental condition.
technical_description: Consumable with environmental adaptation and resistance stacking.
player_impact: Become immune to all environmental hazards completely.

layman_description: Artifact that makes you absolutely perfect at any skill used.
technical_description: Equipment with skill mastery and perfection achievement.
player_impact: Any skill you use becomes perfectly executed.

layman_description: Magical potion that makes you unable to die permanently.
technical_description: Consumable with immortality buff and death immunity duration.
player_impact: Become completely immune to death for a period.

layman_description: Mystical headpiece that makes enemies lose interest in attacking.
technical_description: Equipment with aggression suppression and threat reduction.
player_impact: Zombies ignore you completely and attack others instead.

layman_description: Powerful artifact that makes undead obey your commands.
technical_description: Equipment with mind control and undead subordination.
player_impact: Control zombies and make them fight for you.

layman_description: Ultimate artifact that elevates you beyond mortal limitations.
technical_description: Equipment with transcendence status and reality breaking.
player_impact: Become a god-like entity with unlimited power.
